data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ,
tie me na gye me so.
esiane nea me tamfo reka,
Me koma wɔ ahoyeraw mu;
Ehu ne ahopopo akyekyere me.
Mekae se, “Ao, sɛ mewɔ ntaban sɛ aburuburu a,
anka metu akɔ akyirikyiri
anka mɛyɛ ntɛm akɔ me hintabea,
Awurade, ma amumɔyɛfo nyɛ basaa, na ma wɔn kasa ntoto,
Awia ne anadwo wɔtetɛw nʼafasu ho;
Adesɛefo dɔm reyɛ adwuma wɔ kuropɔn no mu.
Sɛ ɛyɛɛ ɔtamfo na ɔresopa me a,
Nanso ɛyɛ wo, ɔdesani te sɛ me,
a kan no na me ne no wɔ ayɔnkofa a mu yɛ den
Ma owu mmɛfa mʼatamfo mpofirim;
Nanso misu frɛ Onyankopɔn,
Anwummere, anɔpa ne awia,
Ɔde ne ho bɔ afɔre ma minya me ti didi mu
Onyankopɔn a wɔasi no hene afebɔɔ no,
Me yɔnko tow hyɛ ne nnamfonom so;
Ɔwɔ tɛkrɛmawo,
Fa wo haw to Awurade so
Nanso wo, Onyankopɔn, wobɛbrɛ amumɔyɛfo ase
